name: The massive iron flail called 'The Hand of Shadow' (2h)
data: It has awesome weapon class for its type (tremendous in general).
It increases the users strength adequately.
It increases the users constitution poorly.
It increases the users psionic resistance somewhat.
It does shadow damage unbelievably much.
This item loses its magical powers incredibly slowly.
It increases the users shadow resistance somewhat.
Great strength is required to wield this enormous weapon efficiently.
